label: outline_generate
text: {"schema_version": "1.0", "chapters": [{"chapter_id": 1, "title": "The Hermit of Whisperwind Ridge", "goal": "Introduce Kaelen's isolated life and hint at his unusual perceptions, setting a subtle tone of unease.", "beats": [{"beat_id": 1, "summary": "Kaelen, a reclusive scholar, observes strange, unnatural phenomena in the ancient forests surrounding his hermitage."}, {"beat_id": 2, "summary": "He feels a growing, inexplicable unease, a sense that the veil between worlds is thinning."}, {"beat_id": 3, "summary": "A fleeting, vivid vision of ancient ruins and shimmering light disrupts his sleep, leaving him disturbed."}]}, {"chapter_id": 2, "title": "Echoes in the Stone", "goal": "Introduce the inciting incident and connect Kaelen to ancient, forgotten history.", "beats": [{"beat_id": 1, "summary": "News reaches Kaelen of a rare, ancient artifact unearthed by miners in a nearby valley, radiating an unusual energy."}, {"beat_id": 2, "summary": "Compelled by an unseen force, Kaelen journeys to the excavation site, drawn irresistibly to the relic."}, {"beat_id": 3, "summary": "Upon touching the artifact, he experiences a powerful psychic resonance, overwhelmed by fragmented images of a bygone era."}]}, {"chapter_id": 3, "title": "The Shifting Veil", "goal": "Kaelen experiences his first uncontrolled magical manifestation and the awakening of dormant senses.", "beats": [{"beat_id": 1, "summary": "Kaelen's senses become unnaturally heightened; he perceives subtle magical currents and whispers on the wind."}, {"beat_id": 2, "summary": "During a moment of intense frustration or fear, he inadvertently manipulates a natural element around him, causing a small, localized phenomenon."}, {"beat_id": 3, "summary": "A cryptic message, seemingly formed from light or shadow, appears to him, hinting at an 'awakening'."}]}, {"chapter_id": 4, "title": "The Uninvited Guest", "goal": "Introduce a character who knows of Kaelen's potential and the looming threat.", "

parts.text: {"schema_version": "1.0", "chapters": [{"chapter_id": 1, "title": "The Hermit of Whisperwind Ridge", "goal": "Introduce Kaelen's isolated life and hint at his unusual perceptions, setting a subtle tone of unease.", "beats": [{"beat_id": 1, "summary": "Kaelen, a reclusive scholar, observes strange, unnatural phenomena in the ancient forests surrounding his hermitage."}, {"beat_id": 2, "summary": "He feels a growing, inexplicable unease, a sense that the veil between worlds is thinning."}, {"beat_id": 3, "summary": "A fleeting, vivid vision of ancient ruins and shimmering light disrupts his sleep, leaving him disturbed."}]}, {"chapter_id": 2, "title": "Echoes in the Stone", "goal": "Introduce the inciting incident and connect Kaelen to ancient, forgotten history.", "beats": [{"beat_id": 1, "summary": "News reaches Kaelen of a rare, ancient artifact unearthed by miners in a nearby valley, radiating an unusual energy."}, {"beat_id": 2, "summary": "Compelled by an unseen force, Kaelen journeys to the excavation site, drawn irresistibly to the relic."}, {"beat_id": 3, "summary": "Upon touching the artifact, he experiences a powerful psychic resonance, overwhelmed by fragmented images of a bygone era."}]}, {"chapter_id": 3, "title": "The Shifting Veil", "goal": "Kaelen experiences his first uncontrolled magical manifestation and the awakening of dormant senses.", "beats": [{"beat_id": 1, "summary": "Kaelen's senses become unnaturally heightened; he perceives subtle magical currents and whispers on the wind."}, {"beat_id": 2, "summary": "During a moment of intense frustration or fear, he inadvertently manipulates a natural element around him, causing a small, localized phenomenon."}, {"beat_id": 3, "summary": "A cryptic message, seemingly formed from light or shadow, appears to him, hinting at an 'awakening'."}]}, {"chapter_id": 4, "title": "The Uninvited Guest", "goal": "Introduce a character who knows of Kaelen's potential and the looming threat.", "
